ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
U.S. version dual-band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/1900 frequencies and GPRS capabilities
Entry-level candybar phone with digital audio player; MicroSD expansion to 2 GB
CrystalTalk noise cancellation; speakerphone; organizer
Up to 9 hours of talk time, up to 450 hours (18.75 days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola W230 Unlocked Phone with MP3 Player, and MicroSD Slot--U.S. Version with Warranty (Black/Silver)
